post_message: "The whole show is about raising money -- not to cure autism. Because a lot of people are working on biomedical research. My wife and I couldn't get our kid into any kind of school or program that was adequate for him until he was 7 years old. And people with fewer resources than us -- it's unimaginable to us what they have to go through. And the kids. They deserve better.” — Robert Smigel discusses Night of Too Many Stars   ► Watch the interview: @webpagelink ► Support autism programs: @webpagelink
